grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 罰一【バツイチ】being once divorced, one-time divorcee, one x mark (i.e. one name struck from the family register)
賞罰【ショウバツ】reward and punishment
冥罰【メイバツ】retribution, divine punishment
罰当たり【バチアタリ】damned, cursed, accursed
仏罰【ブツバチ】punishment by Buddha, divine retribution
kun reading compounds: 罰する【ばっする】to punish, to penalize, to penalise
